graphicslib3D.shape

Class Sphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphicslib3D.Shape3D
      • graphicslib3D.shape.Sphere
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Sphere
extends Shape3D
    This class defines a sphere constructed by defining ring made up of vertices in the XZ plane and then making additional rings above and below it, progressively smaller towards the poles. Each vertex has geometric coordinates (X,Y,Z) plus texture coordinates, normal and tangent vectors.
    Author:
    Scott Gordon.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructs a Sphere with specified precision.

      Vertex3D[] getVertices()
      Returns the array of vertices
      void InitSphere()
      Builes the sphere to the specified precision by constructing a vertex list and a list of indices into those vertices.
